title: Ghislaine Maxwell Trial Verdict: Guilty on Five of Six Criminal Counts in Her Sex-Trafficking Case
sub_head: British socialite was accused of conspiring with Jeffrey Epstein to sexually abuse underage girls
body:
British socialiteGhislaine Maxwell was found guilty on Dec. 29, 2021, on five of six criminal counts in her sex-trafficking case.
Ms. Maxwell, 60 years old, pleaded not guilty. Her lawyers argued she is a scapegoat for Jeffrey Epstein, who died in his jail cell in August 2019, about a month after his indictment on sex-trafficking charges. The New York City medical examiner ruled his death a suicide.
